video_title: How To Relax Your Mind - Dr. Julie Smith #Shorts
transcript:
if you're really struggling right now
why not try
getting outside within five minutes of
being outside in green space people
report
major shifts in mood when we're stressed
and we're looking at our screens we tend
to have more of a tunnel vision
but when we get outside we dilate our
gaze and take in more of a panoramic
view
so we can almost see ourselves in our
environment
the process of doing that sends signals
to your brain to calm the stress
response
so you can relax your mind even when
you're dealing with a lot
